pullRequest.title: [FLINK-16772][hive] Move derby dependency to test scope
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
The derby hive-metastore uses is vulnerable to CVE-2015-1832. Since derby is only needed in tests, we should explicitly move it to test scope.
Brief change log

Exclude derby from hive-metastore
Add derby dependency in test scope
Update profiles to use proper derby versions according to hive versions

Verifying this change
Manually run all hive tests for each profile.
Does this pull request potentially affect one of the following parts:

Dependencies (does it add or upgrade a dependency): yes
The public API, i.e., is any changed class annotated with @Public(Evolving): no
The serializers: no
The runtime per-record code paths (performance sensitive): no
Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Kubernetes/Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: no
The S3 file system connector: no

Documentation

Does this pull request introduce a new feature? no
If yes, how is the feature documented? NA

commit.message: [FLINK-16772][hive] Move derby dependency to test scope

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -740,6 +745,14 @@ under the License.
 			<scope>test</scope>
         </dependency>
 
+		<!-- The derby we use suffers some security vulnerabilities. Explicitly set it to test scope here. -->
